directions: Using electric mixer, beat cream cheese and butter in large bowl until smooth. Add powdered sugar and ginger; beat until fluffy and smooth. (Can be made 1 day ahead. Cover; chill. Bring to room temperature, then beat until fluffy before using.)
ingredients: 6 tablespoons (3/4 stick) unsalted butter, room temperature
2 teaspoons finely grated peeled fresh ginger
title: Ginger-Cream Cheese Icing
